_source.short_desc: OnBoard board intelligence platform simplifies complex board processes to make board meetings more effective. Start a free trial now!
_source.long_desc:
Board meetings should be informed, effective, and uncomplicated. 

The OnBoard board intelligence platform transforms complicated processes so boards can focus on what matters: Realizing their vision for the organization. Experience a board portal that makes decision-making easier with a system of record for directors, executives, and administrators and intuitive data and analytics on any device, in any place, at any time. 

Ready to start using OnBoard? Contact us for a free 30-day trial.
_source.target_audience: Board of directors, board directors, board administrators, executive administrators, C-level executives (CEO, President, CFO, CIO/CTO, COO, CMO), IT leaders, Corporate Secretaries.

media.caption: Zoom integration enables face-to-face, secure remote meetings directly within the platform ? no need to download additional web conferencing apps. Engagement Analytics offers anonymized and aggregated real-time insights into how your board works.

Voting & Approvals accelerates decision-making while ensuring compliance. delivers a seamless platform to support high-impact decisions, directors can organize, track, review, comment, and approve decisions ? from anywhere and on any device.

The secure Messenger allows individual or group conversations to discuss sensitive board work. Chat one-on-one, message entire committees, or include the whole board in a conversation using the OnBoard app or any web browser.

The Meeting Minutes tool is the fastest meeting creation tool. Make notes, create tasks, track attendance, and mark motions. Drag and drop any file type, create templates, clone previous meetings, organize documents, and track decisions.

D&O questionnaire solution transforms a cumbersome task into a simple, automated, and replicable annual process with wide range of question types and export options, as well as pre-filled content, eSignatures, and attachments.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a work management platform with powerful file-sharing features, team calendars, shared dashboards, and app integrations.
related_products.features: Wrike is a board management platform used by more than 20,000 companies across the globe. Create spaces, projects, and folders to organize your files, with role-based access to secure sensitive information. Build team dashboards to assign tasks and monitor progress. Schedule your board meetings via shared team calendars and communicate in real-time with other directors by integrating your favorite messaging apps. Streamline your board management activities and work as one with Wrike.

related_products.short_desc: BoardPro provides a smart, elegant way for SMEs and Non Profit organizations to run productive board meetings with less effort.
related_products.features:
**AWARDED CAPTERRA BEST VALUE 2020 - BOARD MANAGEMENT SOFTWARE** 

A board portal for more productive board meetings and smarter decisions. Our affordable and easy-to-use board software helps SMEs and Non Profits streamline their entire board process, increasing efficiency and lifting performance. Administrators work up to 75% more effectively and board members remain focused, contribute more and achieve better outcomes. Starting at $150/month. Up to 40% discount on plans for Non-Profits.

related_products.short_desc: Diligent, the leading governance, risk and compliance (GRC) SaaS provider, accelerate success for organizations and leaders.
related_products.features:
Diligent is the leading board management, governance, risk and compliance (GRC) SaaS provider, serving more than one million users from over 25,000 organizations around the globe. Our modern solutions support a holistic, integrated view of governance processes, audit, risk management, information security, ethics and compliance across the organization. 

Diligent's solutions are built for security and unparalleled simplicity, and come with award-winning support, 24/7/365.

related_products.short_desc: Board Success Platform for Corporate Governance.
related_products.features:
Governance is changing rapidly, and Govenda is the board success platform to help accelerate your boards' transition to stakeholder governance and a deeper connection to the bench strength of your organization, shareholders and stakeholders broadly. 

More than a board portal, Govenda's Board Success Platform is the future of modern governance. Partner with Govenda to reimagine how boards of directors can provide intentional, strategic leadership for key imperatives in a fast-changing world.

related_products.short_desc: A board management platform built by people who know boards. Get expert support and service from a team that's been there.
related_products.features:
At Boardable, we know boards. That's why we built the best board management platform on the market. The last thing you need is more tabs to manage during a mission-critical meeting. We've been there, we get it. Trusted by thousands of organizations around the globe, our platform is optimized for virtual collaboration in a single screen. Get a full board management experience at a fair and flexible price - no surprise add-on costs.

Explore Boardable today with a live demo.

related_products.short_desc: BoardPAC is equipped with the most advanced AES 256 security encryption and offers an intuitive user experience.
related_products.features: BoardPAC is an internationally renowned and award-winning board meeting automation system available on iPads, iPhones, mac devices, Windows surfaces, Android Tabs and Phones. The solution is designed with secure end-to-end AES-256 encryption and an enterprise-grade set of features. Key capabilities include the ability to connect leading third-party video conferencing providers, MDM, active directory, on-premise, and cloud-hosted solutions.

related_products.short_desc: Designed for busy executives, Nasdaq Boardvantage? is an award-winning  board portal for optimizing the entire workflow of meetings.
related_products.features: We believe technology should break down barriers and empower people to work together. That's why Nasdaq Boardvantage? helps boards and leadership teams optimize the entire workflow of meetings. Help save time on preparation, engage with confidence, and enhance strategic decision-making. Trusted by more than 50% of Fortune 100 companies, our board portal is equipped with end-to-end security features and up-front pricing. And with award-winning 24/7/365 support, when you come to us, we listen.

related_products.short_desc: You should expect more from your k-12 & community college board management software. BoardDocs can help.
related_products.features: BoardDocs allows organizations to significantly improve the way they create and manage board packets, access information, and conduct remote or in-person meetings. We developed BoardDocs for the specific needs of K-12 school systems and community colleges. BoardDocs has helped over 4,000 organizations dramatically lower costs, increase transparency and reduce time-of-staff by up to 75%. Because our solutions are so easy to use, your organization will operate more effectively from day one.

related_products.short_desc: Convene is a board management software that allows easy and secure access to meetings and documents on any device anytime, anywhere.
related_products.features: Convene is the multi-awarded board management software that increases the efficiency of meetings, from organizing and distributing board documents, to documenting and generating action items. Its highly intuitive, and easy-to-use features make it the choice for listed companies, banks, governments, and non-profits in over 100 countries. Convene is developed by Azeus, a CMMI level 5 company with more than 30 years of experience in IT development. Start a free trial or request a free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: BoardEffect, a Diligent brand, enables seamless and secure collaboration among governance leaders for effective board management.
related_products.features: BoardEffect, a Diligent brand, is an agile board management solution optimized for nonprofit, community healthcare, higher education and credit union organizations to deliver the right tools to drive more efficient, collaborative, and secure governance. Part of Diligent, the leading provider of modern governance solutions, BoardEffect is trusted by 40,000+ boards and communities, helping them seamlessly access resources and information to meet the organization's most immediate challenges.

similar_products.short_desc: Aprio's board management software helps organizations run effective board meetings and make strategic decisions outside the boardroom.
similar_products.features: Aprio is an easy-to-use board management software enabling organizations to streamline board meeting preparation, improve board engagement, and facilitate decision-making outside the boardroom. Our secure platform addresses the top priorities of modern boards such as having instant access to board materials from any device at any time or enabling real-time collaboration and communication. Backed by a 24/7 support team of experienced board admins, Aprio makes good governance simple and affordable

similar_products.short_desc: Huddle replaces the inefficiencies & security risks associated with collating & sharing board materials through email and paper copies.
similar_products.features: Huddle replaces the inefficiencies and security risks associated with collating and sharing board materials through email and paper copies. Huddle is more than a simple board pack solution; move your agendas, documents and discussions into a portal that's user-friendly, collaborative, and optimized for both desktop and mobile devices. Auditable, accessible and secure, Huddle uses strict security controls to protect and govern your confidential and sensitive board information.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy Board is a simple, web-based platform that helps non-profit leaders save time and optimize board resources.
similar_products.features:
Easy Board is the best way to manage a nonprofit or volunteer board. Staying on top of board documents, meetings, files, and contact information can be hard. With Easy Board, managing and distributing board information has never been simpler.

There are lots of board tools out there, but ours is purpose-built for busy, volunteer board members. It's so simple, there's a near-zero learning curve.

similar_products.short_desc: One shared place for meeting prep, document sharing, communication & followup. Helping everyone save time and get more out of meetings.
similar_products.features:
One shared space for meeting prep, document sharing, communication & followup. Helping everyone save time and get more out of meetings.

More and more organisations are making the switch to iBabs to manage their board meetings. Cheaper, faster and more reliable, iBabs gives users complete control to manage their account in a way that works for them (like adding or removing users month to month as they see fit).

similar_products.short_desc: DocSend is a secure sharing platform that helps you identify who is interested in doing business with you and protect your documents.
similar_products.features:
Run your next board meeting with DocSend Spaces. Create a secure data room to share board materials ahead of time, update documents on the fly, and present to remote board members. 

Each DocSend Spaces comes with its own security features, ensuring that you always have control over who has access to your share documents.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Entity Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Entity Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Entity Management software and related services enable organizations to maintain a searchable and easily accessible repository of records of one or more legal formations under their control.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top File Sharing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of File Sharing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: File Sharing software gives you the ability to quickly and securely share data across your company and with external partners. Sync your data across all your devices, access files and information from anywhere, and solve your data storage problems with file sharing software. Need more help? Visit the Collaboration software, Document Management software, Content Management software, and Portal software categories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Meeting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Meeting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Meeting software enables teams to coordinate, schedule, conduct, and participate in collaborative meetings.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Portal software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Portal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Portal software provides a secure, common gateway to enterprise data and applications, enabling greater efficiency and range for business-to-business, business-to-internal and business-to-consumer transactions in both self-service and on-demand environments. Portal applications typically feature robust content management systems (CMS) allowing the distribution and presentation of key data throughout an enterprise, as well as collaborative work and document synchronization features. Portal solutions also provide integration to external database resources, sales and CRM tools and a variety of management reporting features. Portal software is related to Catalog Management software, Content Management software, Knowledge Management software and Web Collaboration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reporting software applications allow real-time access to essential data as well as the rapid generation of multidimensional reports from diverse data sources. Among many other uses, Reporting software can generate financial statements, track the success of sales strategies, monitor responsiveness to regulatory compliance concerns and manage internal controls or security audits. Reporting software is related to Business Intelligence software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Scheduling software automates the scheduling of events, employees, rooms and other resources. Organizations use these applications to manage the planning of internal and external activities. Typically Scheduling software provides tools such as a shared calendar providing real-time project, task, employee and resource scheduling as well as a variety of forecasting, allocation and resource management features. Often other details, such as resource categorization, location details, timesheet records and employee skill-sets can be edited, updated and managed from the scheduling interface. Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Facility Management software and Appointment Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Web Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Web Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Web Conferencing software enables organizations to conduct interactive conferences and meetings online. Typical features include: two-way audio, video conferencing, application sharing, presentation streaming, presence/availability detection and electronic hand raising. Web Conferencing applications also often feature instant messaging, presence and contact management features. Web Conferencing software is related to Web Collaboration software.
